question: Satyashodhak Samaj whose main aim was to liberate the social Shudra and Untouchables castes from exploitation and oppression was established by _____?
explanation: Satyashodhak Samaj was founded by Jyotirao Govindrao Phule in Pune, Maharashtra, on 24 September 1873. It was a social reform society. It mainly focused on empowering the underprivileged groups, women, Shudras, and Dalits. Savitribai (Wife of Jyotirao) was the head of women's section of the organization.
